description: MCP server providing access to US national parks information including park details, alerts, visitor centers, campgrounds, and events. All data is sourced from an offline database.
name: National Parks Server

tools.description: Search for national parks by name, description, state, or designation.

designation.description: Optional designation type (e.g., "National Park") to filter parks.

search_term.description: Optional search term to match against park names or descriptions.

state.description: Optional state code (e.g., "CA", "WY") to filter parks by location.

tools.name: findParks

parks.description: List of matching parks with their basic information.

tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific national park by its park code.

parkCode.description: The unique park code (e.g., "yell" for Yellowstone).

tools.name: getParkDetails

activities.description: List of available activities at the park.

directions.description: Directions and access information for the park.

entranceFees.description: List of entrance fees and pass information.

fullName.description: Full official name of the park.

tools.description: Get current alerts for national parks with optional filtering.

category.description: Optional alert category to filter by (e.g., "Safety", "Weather").

end_date.description: Optional end date (YYYY-MM-DD) to filter alerts by last indexed date.

parkCode.description: Optional park code to filter alerts for a specific park.

search_text.description: Optional text to search in alert titles and descriptions.

start_date.description: Optional start date (YYYY-MM-DD) to filter alerts by last indexed date.

tools.name: getAlerts

alerts.description: List of alerts matching the filter criteria.

tools.description: Get information about visitor centers with optional filtering.

parkCode.description: Optional park code to filter visitor centers for a specific park.

search_name.description: Optional text to search in visitor center names.

tools.name: getVisitorCenters

visitor_centers.description: List of visitor centers matching the filter criteria.

tools.description: Get information about available campgrounds with optional filtering.

amenities.description: Optional list of amenities to filter by (e.g., ["Restrooms", "Fire Rings"]).

parkCode.description: Optional park code to filter campgrounds for a specific park.

search_name.description: Optional text to search in campground names.

tools.name: getCampgrounds

campgrounds.description: List of campgrounds matching the filter criteria.

tools.description: Find upcoming events at parks with optional filtering.

category.description: Optional event category to filter by (e.g., "Ranger Program", "Guided Hike").

end_date.description: Optional end date (YYYY-MM-DD) to filter events ending before this date.

parkCode.description: Optional park code to filter events for a specific park.

start_date.description: Optional start date (YYYY-MM-DD) to filter events starting after this date.

tools.name: getEvents

events.description: List of events matching the filter criteria.
